remarks: The object part of the Hom functor maps ` X , Y ` to the set of morphisms from ` X ` to ` Y ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2017.)
statement:
hofval.m $e |- M = ( HomF ` C ) $.
hofval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
hof1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
hof1.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
hof1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
hof1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
hof1 $p |- ( ph -> ( X ( 1st ` M ) Y ) = ( X H Y ) ) $.
